import React, {useContext} from 'react' import './AllPosts.css' import Container from 'react-bootstrap/Container' import Row from 'react-bootstrap/Row' import Col from 'react-bootstrap/Col' import {UserContext} from '../Context/userContext' const AllPosts = () => { let posts = [ {profileURL: 'https://picsum.photos/200/300', name:'amer shboul', image:"https://picsum.photos/200/300", caption:"lorem ipusm lorem ipusm lorem ipusm lorem ipusm lorem ipusm lorem ipusm"}, {profileURL: 'https://picsum.photos/200/300', name:'amer shboul', image:"https://picsum.photos/200/300", caption:"lorem ipusm lorem ipusm lorem ipusm lorem ipusm lorem ipusm lorem ipusm"}, {profileURL: 'https://picsum.photos/200/300', name:'amer shboul', image:"https://picsum.photos/200/300", caption:"lorem ipusm lorem ipusm lorem ipusm lorem ipusm lorem ipusm lorem ipusm"}, {profileURL: 'https://picsum.photos/200/300', name:'amer shboul', image:"https://picsum.photos/200/300", caption:"lorem ipusm lorem ipusm lorem ipusm lorem ipusm lorem ipusm lorem ipusm"}, {profileURL: 'https://picsum.photos/200/300', name:'amer shboul', image:"https://picsum.photos/200/300", caption:"lorem ipusm lorem ipusm lorem ipusm lorem ipusm lorem ipusm lorem ipusm"}, ] const [user, setUser] = useContext(UserContext).user; return ( <>
{posts.map((post, id) => ( <>

{post.name}

Delete

{post.caption}

 ) )}
) } export default AllPosts
